content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of 4 blocks in total
- It has 2 layers:
  * Bottom layer: 2 vertical orange cylindrical pillars
  * Top layer: 1 horizontal yellow rectangular block with 1 orange triangular block on top

Required blocks from the dictionary:
- 2x Block #6 (vertical orange cylinders)
- 1x Block #2 (horizontal yellow rectangular block)
- 1x Block #12 (orange triangular block)

Assembly order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6
    Step2: Move block with index 6
    Step3: Move block with index 2
    Step4: Move block with index 12
}

This will create the structure showing two orange vertical cylinders supporting a horizontal yellow rectangular block, with an orange triangular block placed on top of the yellow block.
